options.name: use
options.description: Enable the command blacklist and disable the whitelist. This is the default bot behavior. All commands will work unless they are on the blacklist.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a command to the blacklist by name

options.name: command
options.description: The command to be added to the blacklist

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a command currently on the command blacklist

options.name: command
options.description: The command to be removed from the blacklist

options.name: view
options.description: View the contents of the command blacklist.

options.name: clear
options.description: Remove all commands currently on the command blacklist. If the blacklist is enabled, all commands will be enabled.
